title: Super Soccer League Sparks Super Backlash
itunes:title: Super Soccer League Sparks Super Backlash
description:
A plan by some of Europe’s biggest soccer clubs to form their own breakaway "Super League" inflamed fans, and sent the world's richest sport into a frenzy. Jason, Barr, and Lynch get the inside scoop with FC Helsingor Chairman & Co-Owner Jordan Gardner, and NBC Sports Premier League Analyst Robbie Mustoe. Plus, Bloomberg UK Finance Reporter Tom Metcalf joins the podcast to break down the role played by JPMorgan Chase & Co.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
